item.description:
Led by Dan Agro of AgroMyco and Resilient Roots.
http://resilientroots.blogspot.com
This will be a hands on workshop, exploring the world of mushroom innoculation in your home landscape, health benefits and uses. ... This is a hands on workshop,attendees will be working with tools to drill out holes, plug those areas with saw dust that has been inoculated with Shiitake,and then sealing the plugs with bees wax.

Participants will take home inoculated log of Shiitake mushrooms.

All Skill levels welcome!

$45 ( please send cash/ checks to Resilient Roots, Paypal will be made available soon,if you would like to paypal the fee, please email Dan at , dan@resilientroots.com)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Shiitake Log Workshop with Dan Agro
